official_title: A bill to modify the project for the Cuyahoga River Basin, Ohio, to provide for relocation of certain utilities in the vicinity of the Cleveland Zoo.

summary.text: Modifies the flood control project for the Cuyahoga River Basin, Ohio, to provide for the relocation of certain utilities in the vicinity of the Cleveland Zoo. Requires non-Federal interests to pay ten percent of the total cost of such relocation.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the Cuyahoga River Basin, Ohio, to provide for relocation of certain utilities in the vicinity of the Cleveland Zoo.
